price: But Allah will never delay a soul when its appointed time comes, and Allah is All-Aware of what you do.
arabic: وَلَن يُؤَخِّرَ ٱللَّهُ نَفۡسًا إِذَا جَآءَ أَجَلُهَاۚ وَٱللَّهُ خَبِيرُۢ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
